TopicTitle: Total Science Required for Tech Tree

Articles.Content:
So I have been doing a quick google for the total science required and to my surprise I could not locate the sum . This prompted a trip into excel to record the name and value of every node. I believe they are all there. 


0	-	Start
5	-	Basic Rocketry
20	-	General Rocketry
18	-	Stability
15	-	Survivability
45	-	Advanced Rocketry
45	-	General Construction
45	-	Flight Control
45	-	Science Tech
90	-	Heavy Rocketry
90	-	Fuel Systems
90	-	Advanced Construction
90	-	Aerodynamics
90	-	Advanced Flight Control
90	-	Electrics
90	-	Space Exploration
90	-	Landing
160	-	Heavier Rocketry
160	-	Specialized Control
160	-	Specialized Construction
160	-	Supersonic Flight
160	-	Precision Engineering
160	-	Advanced Electrics
160	-	Advanced Exploration
160	-	Advanced Landing
300	-	Nuclear Propulsion
300	-	Large Control
300	-	Advanced MetalWorks
300	-	Advanced Aerodynamics
300	-	High Altitude Flight
300	-	Unmanned Tech
300	-	Ion Propulsion
300	-	Large Electrics
300	-	Electronics
300	-	Field Science
550	-	Very Heavy Rocketry
550	-	Meta-Materials
550	-	Composites
550	-	Heavy Aerodynamics
550	-	Hypersonic Flight
550	-	Advanced Unmanned Tech
550	-	Large Probes
550	-	Specialized Electrics
550	-	Advanced Science Tech
550	-	Advanced Motors

10738	-	Total

I hope that I haven't wasted my time on this, but I needed it for myself. Hopefully someone else can find use in this.
You may have, as I wouldn't be at all surprised to see a lot of these changed in 0.23

I've calculated that number more than once myself. Eventually I stuck it in a spreadsheet for where I do my advanced mission planning. (Yeah, I think Career mode and I are going to get along JUUUUUST fine as it gets more features added to it...)
